front.title: MIKEY General Extension Payload for OMA BCAST LTKM/STKM Transport

abstract.t: This document specifies a new MIKEY General Extension payload [1] to transport the short term key message (STKM) and long term key message (LTKM) payloads defined in the Open Mobile Alliance's (OMA) Browser and Content (BAC) Broadcast (BCAST) group's Service and Content protection specification.
